沉.definition: to submerge; to immerse; to sink; to keep down; to lower; to drop; deep; profound; heavy

沉不住氣.definition: to lose one's cool; to get impatient; unable to remain calm

沉住氣.definition: to keep cool; to stay calm

沉凝.definition: stagnant; congealed; fig. grave in manner; low (of voice)

沉得住氣.definition: to stay calm; to keep one's composure

沉思.definition: to contemplate; to ponder; contemplation; meditation

沉悶.definition: oppressive (of weather); heavy; depressed; not happy; (of sound) dull; muffled

沉浮.definition: lit. sinking and floating; to bob up and down on water; ebb and flow; fig. rise and fall; ups and downs of fortune; vicissitudes

沉浸.definition: to soak; to permeate; to immerse

沉淪.definition: to sink into (vice, depravity etc); to pass into oblivion; downfall; passing

沉湎.definition: deeply immersed; fig. wallowing in; deeply engrossed in

沉湎酒色.definition: to wallow in alcohol and sex (idiom); overindulgence in wine and women; an incorrigible drunkard and lecher

沉溺.definition: to indulge in; to wallow; absorbed in; deeply engrossed; addicted

沉潛.definition: to lurk under water; to immerse oneself in (study etc); to lie low; to keep a low profile; quiet; reserved; self-possessed

沉潭.definition: to sink sb to the bottom of a pond (a kind of private punishment, especially for unfaithful wives)

沉澱.definition: (chemistry) to settle; to precipitate; (chemistry) sediment; precipitate; (fig.) to accumulate

沉痛.definition: grief; remorse; deep in sorrow; bitter (anguish); profound (condolences)

沉痼.definition: chronic illness; fig. deeply entrenched problem

沉痾.definition: chronic illness; (fig.) deep-rooted problem; longstanding issue

沉睡.definition: to be fast asleep; (fig.) to lie dormant; to lie undiscovered

沉著.definition: steady; calm and collected; not nervous

沉著應戰.definition: to remain calm in the face of adversity (idiom)

沉迷.definition: to be engrossed; to be absorbed with; to lose oneself in; to be addicted to

沉降.definition: to subside; to cave in; subsidence

沉陷.definition: to sink; to cave in; (of a building etc) to subside; (fig.) to get lost (in contemplation, daydreams etc)

沉靜寡言.definition: see 沉默寡言[chen2 mo4 gua3 yan2]

沉香.definition: Chinese eaglewood; agarwood tree; lignum aloes (Aquilaria agallocha)

沉魚落雁.definition: lit. fish sink, goose alights (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3]); fig. female beauty captivating even the birds and beasts
